description: Maria Sharapova Foundation ScHolarship for Youth from the Chernobyl-affected Areas of Belarus

subproject.description: The project aims to establish a scholarship mechanism enabling talented students from Chernobyl-affected families and regions to gain better access to high-quality education in the leading universities of the country. The scholarship will provide cash grants to recipients that will enable them to cover the tuition (where not covered by a stipend) and living costs related to their studies (five year scholarships awarded to outstanding students).
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Sharapova Foundation Scolarsh

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
